function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increases in rates of domestic violence and intimate partner violence (DV and IPV) during stay-at-home lockdowns.","Impact":"Victims suffering prolonged and sustained exposure to the risk of harm from a violent partner in constantly close proximity. Mental health of victims being compromised.","Mitigation":"Increase support services and resources for victims of domestic violence. Provide mental health support for individuals affected by lockdowns.","Technologies":"Telehealth for mental health support. Mobile applications for reporting and seeking help.","People":"Victims of domestic violence, individuals affected by lockdowns.","Owner":"Government, social service organizations, healthcare providers."},{"Description":"Wide variations in the status of psychological violence and coercive control in countries where domestic violence is criminalized.","Impact":"Lack of legal protection for victims of psychological violence and coercive control. Inadequate recognition and accountability for these forms of violence.","Mitigation":"Review and strengthen domestic violence laws to include provisions for psychological violence and coercive control. Increase awareness and education on the impact of psychological violence.","Technologies":"Legal database systems for tracking and managing domestic violence cases. Educational platforms for raising awareness.","People":"Victims of psychological violence and coercive control, legal authorities.","Owner":"Government, legal authorities, advocacy groups."},{"Description":"Substantial mental health harms attributable to Covid-19 lockdowns, including years of life lost (Yll) due to psychosocial consequences.","Impact":"Long-term mental health consequences for individuals affected by lockdowns. Reduced well-being and happiness indicators.","Mitigation":"Expand mental health support services and interventions. Implement community-based mental health programs for affected populations.","Technologies":"Teletherapy platforms for remote mental health counseling. Data analytics tools for assessing mental health trends and needs.","People":"Individuals affected by lockdowns, mental health professionals.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations, government."}]}
